roleset.name: determine quite detailedly
roleset.note: PINPOINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pinpoint' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet or Framenet entry. No comparison. (from pinpoint.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive, boring
example.text: [Osamu Nagayama, deputy president of Chugai, which spends about 15% of its sales on research and development,]-1 was unable *trace*-1 to pinpoint how much money Chugai would pump into Gen-Probe.
example.arg: how much money Chugai would pump into Gen-Probe
